document.masterDocTitle: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

subSubSection.paragraph:
Haliplus connexus Matheson. Allamakee
:
French Cr. , Churchtown , CTH , 7/1/96; Wayne: Unnamed trib. Steel Cr. , Humeston, TMM , 5/23/12. Distribution : Northeastern USA , extending west to North Dakota , Minnesota
, and Iowa .

Haliplus fasciatus Aubé. Clinton
:
Barber Cr. , Grand Mound , CTH , 8/9/12; Jackson: Farmers Cr. , Fulton, MWB , 8/14/12. Distribution : Eastern USA , extending west to Wisconsin in the north, Iowa , Kansas , and Texas in the south. Iowa forms part of the western border
.

Haliplus immaculicollis Harris. Allamakee
:
Clear Cr., Lansing, MWB, 8/16/07; Butler:

Haliplus longulus LeConte. Kossuth
:
Kettle Wetland-Union Slough NWR, Bancroft, CTH , 5/ 6/97. Distribution : Northern transcontinental in the USA , with Iowa forming part of the southern border in the Midwest
.

( Wickham 1911 );
Van Buren :
Chequest Cr. , Pittsburg , CTH , 9/14/15. Distribution : Northeastern USA , extending west to Iowa and Missouri
.

Peltodytes lengi Roberts.
(Downie and Arnett 1996)
. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to the Midwest, with Iowa forming part of the western border.

Peltodytes litoralis Matheson. Des Moines
:
Skunk R., Burlington, MWB, 9/7/06. Distribution:

paragraph.materialsCitation: Southcentral USA with Iowa forming part of the northern border with records extending south to Texas , east to Indiana , and west to Colorado . New state record

subSubSection.paragraph:
Peltodytes sexmaculatus Roberts. Allamakee
:
Little Paint Cr., Harpers Ferry, CTH , 8/27/14; Appanoose: Little Shoal Cr., Cincinnati, CTH , 10/4/11; Cass: West Nodaway R ., Grant, TMM , 8/20/12; Davis: Soap Cr., Drakesville, CTH , 8/ 16/04; Decatur: Long Cr., Van Wert, TMM , 7/ 15/14; Des Moines: Cottonwood Drain, Burlington, CTH , 8/5/03; Dubuque: Little Maquoketa R ., Dubuque, CTH , 9/25/12; Henry: Skunk R ., Oakland Mills, CTH , 9/24/08; Johnson: Iowa R ., Iowa City, CTH , 9/14/12; Linn: Wapsipinicon R ., Troy Mills, CTH , 9/24/03; Louisa: Honey Cr., Conesville, CTH , 7/26/04; Lucas: Wolf Cr., Chariton, TMM , 9/12/12; Marion: English Cr., Knoxville, MWB, 7/18/ 05; Mills: Douglas Cr., Emerson, TMM , 9/25/13; Muscatine: Mad Cr., Muscatine, CTH , 6/30/04; Poweshiek: Walnut Cr., Belle Plaine, CTH , 9/17/ 08; Ringgold: Lotts Cr., Lamoni, TMM , 7/18/03; Sioux: Deep Cr., Granville, KLS, 9/26/06; Taylor: Honey Cr., Bedford, TMM , 7/22/14; Van Buren: Coppers Cr., Keosauqua, CTH , 10/6/09; Warren: South R ., Ackworth, TMM , 9/ 23/15; Wayne: Dick Cr., Corydon, TMM , 8/12/ 09; Winneshiek: Yellow R ., Postville, CTH , 7/ 25/07. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north, Iowa , Kansas , and Texas in the south. New state record.

Peltodytes tortulosus Roberts. Appanoose
:
Little Shoal Cr., Cincinnati, CTH, 10/4/11; Henry: Big Cedar Cr., Oakland Mills, MWB, 9/12/08; Louisa: Honey Cr., Conesville, CTH, 7/26/04; Polk: Walnut Cr., Windsor Heights, CTH, 8/26/ 98; Poweshiek: Walnut Cr., Holiday Lake, CTH, 7/27/09; Wayne: South Fk. Chariton R., Corydon, TMM, 8/24/12. Distribution: Northeastern USA , with Iowa forming part of the southwestern border. New state record.
